channel.title: Kyle Felter - Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Kyle Felter - Blog

item.title: Photography
item.description: This was a photography session at Virginia Tech’s Duck Pond on October 31, 2015 The tree outside my aprtment after snow Sadie waiting to play The Capitol Wheel in National Harbor, MD My mom insisting I had a Christmas tree in my apartment that year at college My dogs being goofy when I cought them on the couch We buried my little brother in the sand

item.title: Create a blog
item.description: How I created this blog in under an hour Use the smallest ec2 instance with a simple go file server Follow this guide for hugo Write a deploy script to your ec2 deploy.sh Now everytime I create a new post all I have to do is run deploy.sh The full blog code can be found here https://github.com/felts94/blog
